OOC: this post have been done in MSN.


Malice:  "Feel any better?" the male asked the femme in a soft 
voice.  The rain was still coming down hard, it was getting a little 
cold.
BlackNightmare :  The femme huged him and said "Yes I'm"
Malice: "That's good.  This storm is probably going to last a 
while.  Want me to find a heater or emergency blanket?"  The 
interior of the ship was cooling off through the cracks in the 
hull.  Steam was beginning to form off their bodies, being the only 
warm things in the room.
Blacknightmare: "Let's go to find some blanket" said the femme who 
started to shook due cold
Malice:  The male sat up and began opening crates, sifting through 
their contents.  He didn't pay any attention to anything, it all 
seemed meaningless to him.  In a crate farthest away he found a 
heavy, wool like blanket.  Smiling, he walked back over to 
Blacknightmare and sat next to her, wrapping the heavy blanket 
around them.  "There, that ought to help," he said smiling.
BlackNightmare:  the femem moved close to him, her head rested on 
his shoulder. She felt protected and happy
Malice:  He put an arm around Blacknightmare, it was getting warm 
under the blanket.  Which was good, because he hated the cold.  He 
smiled, and began o nod off to sleep again.
Blacknightmare: Black nightmare started to touch kindly Malice's 
cheek 
Malice:  The male reacted to the femme's touch.  he turned to ward 
her, and smiled.  "That feels good.  Your hand is warm."
BlackNgihtmare: "Who could have  belived that" said soflty the 
femme"Before met you I was a cold person... you teach me to have 
feelings"
Malice:  "I did that?  I have that affect on people," he said, 
giving her a playful squeeze.
Blacknightmare: "You don't know how much"said athe femme so kissed 
him
Malice:  Deepens the kiss, it would also serve to warm them up^^.
BlackNightmare:  The femme moved close to him
Malice:  The male pulled her closer, and continued he kiss, as they 
needed no air.
BlackNightmare: the femme broke the kiss and said "Do you think that 
we should go to know what's doing Hellplague? we haven't heard about 
her in a while"
Malice:  "Sure, I guess.  I hope she is okay." He gets up and leaves 
the blanket around Blacknightmare.
Blacknightmare stood up and wraped the blanked around both, while 
she said "It's enought big to cover us"
Malice:  Smiles and leads Blacknightmare back to the front of the 
craft.  Most of the lights were turned off.  He leaned over the 
chair and switched on an overhead light.  "Okay, let's see if the 
ship has any sustanable power."  Starts checking guages.
Blacknightmare: The femme was looking around, cheking computers and 
controls pannels
